import React from 'react' import '../styles/login.css' import { Col, Container, Row,Button, Form, FormGroup } from 'reactstrap' import LoginImg from '../assets/images/login.png' import userIcon from '../assets/images/user.ppng' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Login = () => { const handleChange = e =>{ setCredentials(prev=>({...prev,[e.target.id]:e.target.value})) } return <>

} export default Login
